name: StasisBreak
description:
Tested in 1920x1080 and 1280x720.

Take control of the Stasis Breaker, a top secret prototype starship with an FTT Drive (Faster Than Time)

Travel backwards in time at will and fight beside your past selves to wreak mayhem! Survive brushes with death by rewinding the clock! Engage an armada of enemy ships and leave nothing but decimation in your wake!

Will you defeat your enemies in time? Or will you just be...

Stuck in a Loop?
